title: Mirrored Fates
story_summary: The Halden Echoes oracle shows everyone visions of how their lives could have been different. People fill the streets, sharing stories and facing old truths. Council leaders admit their mistakes on live broadcasts. The city chooses to limit the BCI and create a more open, just system together.

official.headline: New Visions Unveiled
official.anchor_line: The Halden Echoes oracle displays alternate histories for all citizens, inspiring unity and reflection city-wide.
official.contextual_reframing: This data-driven initiative deepens collective understanding and affirms the transparency of Stenograd's governance.

official.headline: Gatherings Spark Insight
official.anchor_line: Residents join story circles and confession gatherings, sharing personal journeys for a stronger community.
official.contextual_reframing: Public engagement highlights the city's capacity for healing through measured dialogue and system-supported mutual respect.

official.headline: Council Leads Reform
official.anchor_line: Council members and citizens together initiate participatory justice as BCI influence is formally scaled back.
official.contextual_reframing: Decisive action ensures Stenograd's stability and continued advancement through collaborative, transparent adaptation.

underground.headline: Echoes Break the Silence
underground.anchor_line: Halden's oracle hijacks city screens, spilling what they'd never let you see: our lives, rewritten, exposed for all.
underground.contextual_reframing: The truth leaks out from under scripted order. No algorithm can contain what we remember  -  or what we might become.

underground.headline: Confessions in the Shadows
underground.anchor_line: Strangers gather in alleys and living rooms, sharing unapproved stories now too loud to ignore.
underground.contextual_reframing: Courage grows when we hear each other  -  far from the BCI's gaze, people are remaking trust from the ground up.

underground.headline: Council Faces the Music
underground.anchor_line: Council elites forced onto live feeds, fumble through apologies for years of silent scoring and manipulation.
underground.contextual_reframing: Real healing starts when the powerful are made to listen. The system's mask slips  -  and the city's true voice comes through.
